title: Flying skull
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Flying skulls''' are weak pack monsters, fast and prone to [[noise|noisy]] shrieking. They are found in [[the Crypt]], [[the Tomb]], the [[Hell]]s, [[the Abyss]], and [[Pandemonium]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*Although mostly harmless, they attract enough attention to be a pest to [[stealth]]y characters.
*If you know [[Lee's Rapid Deconstruction]], they make excellent sources of shrapnel. Of course, by using LRD, you'll be abandoning stealth entirely.

==History==
*Flying skulls were removed and replaced with [[laughing skull]]s and [[weeping skull]]s in [[0.31]].
*Prior to [[0.13]], they were even weaker and punier.
